title: Canvas Patent Portfolio — DOCUMENTATION ONLY
filing_cost_note: Micro entity rate, $320 per provisional patent application
filing_authority: Founder must explicitly authorize each filing

patents.title: Audio Emotional DNA Extraction
patents.claim: Method for extracting multi-dimensional emotional vectors from audio signals and mapping them to visual generation parameters in real-time
patents.key_innovation: Multi-layer audio analysis: BPM, key, emotion valence/arousal/tension/release mapped to visual parameters

patents.title: Directorial Intent Encoding
patents.claim: System for encoding cinematic directorial philosophies as controllable latent space parameters for video generation models
patents.key_innovation: Director DNA: philosophy, color theory, camera movement, emotional intent encoded as LoRA weights

patents.title: Seamless Audio-Synced Video Looping
patents.claim: Technique for generating video loops that are visually seamless AND rhythmically synchronized to audio beat structure
patents.key_innovation: Loop via shared emotional state, not shared pixels. Forward-only, no reverse playback.

patents.title: AI Artifact Detection & Regeneration
patents.claim: Automated system for detecting visual artifacts characteristic of AI-generated content and triggering targeted regeneration
patents.key_innovation: Multi-axis quality scoring (Observer Neutrality, Camera Humility, etc.) with 9.3/10 minimum threshold

patents.title: Intent-Based Video Editing
patents.claim: Natural language interface for video editing that translates artistic intent into frame-accurate edit operations
patents.key_innovation: 'Make it feel more like a memory' → specific color, motion, framing parameter adjustments

patents.title: Cultural-Genre Visual Mapping
patents.claim: System for mapping musical genre and cultural context to appropriate visual languages using crowd-sourced artist preferences
patents.key_innovation: Taste Layer: cultural fluency across 10 genres with artist preference learning

patents.title: Progressive Canvas-to-Video Extension
patents.claim: Method for coherently extending short-form video loops into long-form music videos while maintaining visual and narrative consistency
patents.key_innovation: 8-second canvas → 30s → 60s → full music video with same visual language
